author: erikabele
msg: Extended the buildfile to use the local copies of the public
W3C resources(<xmlcatalog>). This allows us to use the extended
entity sets in common.dtd without fetching online-references
Added another target to easily validate the resulting XHTML
docs ('validate-xhtml') and also renamed XML validation target
Also simplified classpath reference and added some comments.
